Articles.Content:
Just wanted to share something I've thought of out of nowhere, and made it. Surprisingly, it worked. I call it the "Aberrant" due to lack of any official name.

![5yCZKIc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5yCZKIc.jpg)

All-stock. 3-m tank. Intakes everywhere. 12 engines on the first and only stage (13 originally, since the middle one has a tendency to kaboom during full thrust).

![N7Fzpgu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/N7Fzpgu.jpg)

![EdFrBQ0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/EdFrBQ0.jpg)

Oh, wow. It looks like a plane and a rocket together!

Amazing!

It's a plane.

No, it's a rocket.

Oh wait - it's both a plane and a rocket ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
So... what, is it using atmospheric engines for the early stages? It looks pretty sweet anyway.
Wow, I may have to end up stealing that idea someday. Nice!

> 
> So... what, is it using atmospheric engines for the early stages? It looks pretty sweet anyway.

Yup! RAPIERs. No engine switching required.
